titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to terminate the essential air service program, and for other purposes.
Free Market Flights Act of 2016
Free Market Flights Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Free Market Flights Act of 2016
This bill terminates on October 1, 2016, Department of Transportation authority to carry out the essential air service program.
The bill requires deposit in the Treasury for deficit reduction of any overflight fees collected by the Federal Aviation Administration for air traffic control and related services that would otherwise be made available for the program.
